Articles.Content: Anyone know of a good inline 3.75m command pod? only needs to hold like 1-2 kerbs... ideally something for piloting additional modules of a multi-docked interplanetary transport.
[Taurus HCV](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75074) has an inline 3.75m 8-passenger crew container, and an inline Science Processing Bay (as well as a non-inline pod)
yeah, but i don't think those work as command pods. i'm looking for something along the lines of the 2m lander can from stock, but in 3.75 size.
